display_long_description:
# THE ARENA WAITS. NOW RECRUITING:
https://discord.gg/polyarcgames

Lead your squad of Champions into a fast-paced and tactile competitive arena where tactics, magic, and power collide. Command your team, protect the glass, and dominate the battlefield in this real-time clash of Champions!

[media]

# Squad Up.
Build your squad from a dynamic roster of 12 Champions each with unique abilities and roles that shape how you counter, combo, and control the match. With deep customization, your squad’s style will be unmistakably your own.

[media] 
# Face Off.
Battle friends in private matches, test your skill in ranked duels, or refine your strategy in AI skirmishes. Each fight is a tactical and tactile showdown. Adapt to your opponent’s squad and command your Champions with precision to turn the tide in your favor.

[media]
# And May the Glass Break Your Way.
On the board, every move matters. Defend your Glass, break your opponent’s, and seize map control through smart positioning and bold plays. Matches are short and intense but mastery runs deep. Unlock new Champions through battle-earned experience and shift your strategy with each win.

[media]

- Fair-to-Play, only cosmetics cost $ 
- Build a squad from a unique roster of 12 Champions
- Master real-time, hex-based tactile battles across 4 arenas
- Unlock new Champions, rewards and +400 cosmetics
- Rise up in ranked 1v1, 2v2, 1v2 or AI Skirmish
- Quick, 10 minute matches and earn XP
- Cross-platform Play!
